page.title: 15RESTORATION OF VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Marston Trussell will open its restored village hall in the summer of 1985. The{official opening}will be performed by Kettering M.P. Roger Freeman in July. The building, which was{originally opened as a{school}in 1857, was temporily closed in 1982 and renovations have been taking place ever since. These renovations include a new kitchen, toilets, flooring, an extension and facilities for the disabled. Over{Â£10,000}for the restoration work has been raised by members of the village, the{population}of which is {125. } The work was carried out by the South Leicestershire Community Programme.
